sqlMap.select: SELECT SESSIONID as sessionid, NUMBER_OF_STUDENTS as numberOfStudents, PROGRAMID as programid, WINDOW_START_DATE as windowStartDate, WINDOW_END_DATE as windowEndDate, SCHEDULERID as schedulerid, SHOW_GE AS showGE FROM SESSION_DIM WHERE SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SESSION_DIM ( SESSIONID, NUMBER_OF_STUDENTS, PROGRAMID, WINDOW_START_DATE, WINDOW_END_DATE, SCHEDULERID, SHOW_GE ) VALUES ( #sessionid:NUMERIC#, #numberOfStudents:NUMERIC#, #programid:NUMERIC#, #windowStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, #windowEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, #schedulerid:NUMERIC#, #showGE:NUMERIC# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SESSION_DIM SET NUMBER_OF_STUDENTS = #numberOfStudents:NUMERIC#, PROGRAMID = #programid:NUMERIC#, WINDOW_START_DATE = #windowStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, WINDOW_END_DATE = #windowEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, SCHEDULERID = #schedulerid:NUMERIC#, SHOW_GE = #showGE:NUMERIC# WHERE SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC#
